actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill entitled the "Cavalry Forts of the Old West: The Historic Kansas Frontier Forts Study Act of 1991".
short_title: Cavalry Forts of the Old West:  The Historic Kansas Frontier Forts Study Act of 1991

summary.text: Cavalry Forts of the Old West: The Historic Kansas Frontier Forts Study Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to study certain historic frontier cavalry forts in Kansas to develop alternative means of collectively preserving and interpreting them. Requires the Secretary to transmit such study to specified congressional committees. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Cavalry Forts of the Old West:  The Historic Kansas Frontier Forts Study Act of 1991
A bill entitled the "Cavalry Forts of the Old West: The Historic Kansas Frontier Forts Study Act of 1991".
